report.title: Volunteer who have not created data recently 4
report.description: List of volunteers who have not created any data in past two years.
report.query: SELECT distinct #columns# FROM people p JOIN users u on u.person_id = p.id and u.deleted=false JOIN person_attribute_values sqrPav ON sqrPav.person_id=u.person_id AND sqrPav.updated_by_id!=u.id AND sqrPav.person_attribute_id=#person_square_attr_id# AND sqrPav.created_on::date < date (extract(year from current_date) - 2 || '-1-1') AND sqrPav.deleted=false JOIN locations sqr ON sqr.id=sqrPav.int_value AND sqr.created_on::date >= date '#ignore_square_dates_before#' AND sqr.location_type_id = #core_square_type_id# AND sqr.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=sqr.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples s_recent on s_recent.created_by_id = u.id AND s_recent.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND s_recent.date_start::date >= date (extract(year from current_date) - 2 || '-1-1') AND s_recent.training=false AND s_recent.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples s_last on s_last.created_by_id = u.id AND s_last.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND s_last.date_start::date < date (extract(year from current_date) - 2 || '-1-1') AND s_last.training=false AND s_last.deleted=false LEFT JOIN users_websites accesscheck on accesscheck.website_id=lw.website_id AND accesscheck.user_id=#auth_user_id# AND accesscheck.site_role_id<3 WHERE s_recent.id IS NULL AND p.deleted=false AND #website_filter#

param.name: person_square_attr_id
param.display: Id of the person attribute that holds user squares

param.name: ignore_square_dates_before
param.description: Ignore any squares created before this date. Useful if old squares are left on the system but are not currently active.

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of NPMS surveys to take into account

column.name: email_address
column.sql: CASE WHEN accesscheck.id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE p.email_address END
